## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are completed -->

### General

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have read and followed CONTRIBUTING.md

### For Plugin Submissions/Updates

- [ ] Plugin structure follows required format
- [ ] `plugin.json` validates against schema
- [ ] `README.md` is complete with:
  - [ ] Installation instructions
  - [ ] Usage examples
  - [ ] Configuration details (if applicable)
- [ ] No sensitive information (API keys, secrets) included
- [ ] Updated `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
- [ ] Updated plugin version (if updating existing plugin)
- [ ] All dependencies are documented

### Documentation

- [ ] Documentation has been updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md has been updated (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] External dependencies are minimal and documented
- [ ] Code is readable and not obfuscated

## For Reviewers

### Review Checklist

- [ ] Code quality is acceptable
- [ ] Functionality works as described

- [ ] Schema validation passes
